articles.title: About This Blog
articles.description: Some additional details about my blog...
articles.contents: As mentioned in my first post, “Hello World!”, this blog has been created for my senior project, which has been summarized in another post. During the current Spring 2021 semester, I will post additional weekly updates about what I’m accomplishing for my senior project. However, I hope to continue this blog after and share what I’ll be continuing to learn, even after the semester ends. Enjoy!
